Expected to be >= 1

_comments: # Planet size factor, applies to units and buildings
# Bombardment damage to planets from ships
# Higher number means more total bombardment damage
# Smaller number means we lose efficiency faster going above the ORBITAL_BOMBARDMENT_FLEET_BASE_SIZE
# Collateral damage to planet from armies
## tradition cost = ( base_cost + ( cost_tradition * num_traditions )^traditions_exponential ) * ( 1 + cost_planet*num_planets + cost_system*num_systems )
# These are used to determine the initial subject loyalty based on relation and relative military power

# Planetary Ascension Tier cap formula:
#     Max( ( Unlocked Ascension Perks Slots - 2 ), PLANET_ASCENSION_MIN ) +
#     ( ( Unlocked Ascension Perks Slots == ASCENSION_PERKS_SLOTS ? ) PLANET_ASCENSION_COMPLETION_BONUS : 0 )
# Planetary Ascension cost formula: ( Empire Sprawl * PLANET_ASCENSION_SPRAWL_SCALE) * ( 1 + ( Empire Wide Sum of Ascension Tiers * PLANET_ASCENSION_SUM_SCALE )
# Designation modifier formula: MOD * ( 1 + ( Ascension Tier * PLANET_ASCENSION_MODIFIER_SCALE )
# Grand Archive collection
NON_PARAGON_LEADER_TRAIT_SELECTION_LEVEL.PLANET_ASCENSION_STARTING_POINT: 3 # Number of ascension perks unlocked slots required for Planetary Ascension
NON_PARAGON_LEADER_TRAIT_SELECTION_LEVEL.PLANET_ASCENSION_COMPLETION_BONUS: 4 # Flat bonus on Planetary Ascension Tier cap when all the slots are unlocked
NON_PARAGON_LEADER_TRAIT_SELECTION_LEVEL.PLANET_ASCENSION_SPRAWL_SCALE: 10.0 # Scaling factor for Planetary Ascension cost based on the empire Sprawl
NON_PARAGON_LEADER_TRAIT_SELECTION_LEVEL.PLANET_ASCENSION_SUM_SCALE: 0.6 # Scaling factor for Planetary Ascension cost based on the empire-wide sum of Ascension Tiers
NON_PARAGON_LEADER_TRAIT_SELECTION_LEVEL.PLANET_ASCENSION_SPRAWL_MODIFIER: -0.05# Reduction of planet sprawl per level of ascension
NON_PARAGON_LEADER_TRAIT_SELECTION_LEVEL.PLANET_ASCENSION_MODIFIER_SCALE: 0.25 # Scaling factor of the designation benefits, multiple instances will sum (first will be 1.25, then 1.50...)

_comments: # When ships are attacking they will try to stay at max range and orbit their target.
# If the ship is closer than max range this value determines how fast it will "back off" in order to get to max range.
# 0.0 means that the ship will not back off and orbit with whatever radius it already has
# 1.0 means that the ship will prioritize orbit velocity the same as "back-off"-velocity. i.e a 45 degree angle
NCombat.SHIP_SMOOTH_ROTATION_THRESHOLD: 3.141 # Used to smooth rotation rate of ships. equation is "y = x * ( min ( 1.0 x / SHIP_SMOOTH_ROTATION_THRESHOLD ) )" where x is the wanted delta rotation this tick and y the resulting delta rotation
NCombat.FORCE_DISPARITY_BASE: 20	# Added to size of fleets when calculating force disparity

NCombat.ADMIRAL_DEATH_CHANCE: 0.1		# Chance that admiral dies when their ship gets blown up
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_TARGETING_SIZE_MULT: 0.03	# The higher this weight is, the more likely smaller, more fragile ships are to be targeted first
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_TARGETING_TRACKING_MULT: 2.0	# This weight is needed to ensure high-tracking ships target high-evasion ships
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_EVASION_TARGETING_WEIGHT: 2.0	# The higher this is, the less likely ships are to target enemy ships with high chance to evade their shots

NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_DISTANCE_TARGETING_WEIGHT: 0.002		# The higher this is, the less likely ships will be to fire on distant targets
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_DISTANCE_TARGETING_WEIGHT_MI: 0.10	# Target weight can't be multiplied by less than this due to distance
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_UNARMED_TARGETING_WEIGHT: 0.005		# The lower this is, the less likely ships are to target unarmed enemies over armed ones
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_STARBASE_TARGETING_WEIGHT: 0.75	# The lower this is, the less likely ships are to target Starbases over military ships & defensive platforms
NCombat.COMBAT_SHIP_EVASION_AVOID_MIN_SHIP_SIZE: 8		# Minimum size of ships that should try to avoid firing on highly evasive targets

NCombat.COMBAT_EMERGENCY_FTL_DAMAGE_AMOUNT: 0.75 # x% of damage that emergency ftl can potentially cause
NCombat.COMBAT_BASE_DAYS_UNTIL_EMERGENCY_FTL: 14.0	# how many days a fleet should be in combat until they can emergency ftl
NCombat.MISSILE_HIGH_CONTROL_DISTANCE: 5.0 # if the missile is closer to the target than MISSILE_HIGH_CONTROL_DISTANCE it will turn sharply
NCombat.MISSILE_HIGH_CONTROL_INTERPOLATION_RANGE: 5.0 # how long the missile will interpolate between "smooth controls" and "full control
NCombat.MISSILE_BASE_ROTATION_SPEED: 0.001 # base rotation rate of missiles in radians per tick
NCombat.MISSILE_RETARGET_CHANCE_START: 100 # How likely a missile is to find a new target in range the first time its target is lost
NCombat.MISSILE_RETARGET_CHANCE_REDUCTION: 35 # How much the chance for a missile to find a new target is reduced each retargeting after the first

AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_VOTE_ABSTAIN_THRESHOLD: 5.5			# the AI weight of a resolution need to be at least this much, else the AI will oppose it
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_VOTE_SUPPORT_THRESHOLD: 7.0			# if the AI weight of a resolution reaches this value the AI will vote for it
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_VOTE_VETO_THRESHOLD: 1.0			# if the AI hates something this much ( weight is lower ), they might veto it
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_VOTE_EMERGENCY_THRESHOLD: 10.0		# if it isnt their own resolution but the AI still loves something this much they might declare it an Emergency Measure
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_VOTE_FREEZE_THRESHOLD_DELTA: 3.0	# if the resolution next in line after the current resolution is this much better, the AI will freeze the current resolution
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_USE_FAVORS_THRESHOLD_DELTA: 2.0		# if weight reaches the threshold +/- DELTA (support/abstain) AI will use favors to boost their diplo weight
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_TARGET_OPINION_MIN_FACTOR: 0.0		# Corresponds to Terrible opinion towards the resolution target if resolution is non-harmful, Excellent opinion if harmful
_comments: # Resolution AI weight is multiplied by values in these ranges based on opinion
# If no objective is found, the backup AI will send it to the closest objective available, or back to base.
# new tech will upgrade individual components more often however)
# Loyalty is multiplied by this and added to (overlord's) acceptance
# If subject is/will be a Specialist, Loyalty is multiplied by this and added to (overlord's) acceptance
# Flags that indicate what cosmic storm an AI country in affected by
# location weights for the AI assigning leaders to location
# higher priority locations get leaders first
# Flags that indicate what cosmic storm an AI country in affected by

AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_PROPOSER_OPINION_BASE_FACTOR: 1.0	# Will be used if opinion towards the proposer is neutral
AI_RARE_RESOURCES.RESOLUTION_PROPOSER_OPINION_MAX_FACTOR: 1.3	# Corresponds to Excellent opinion towards the proposer
